text: Ezɨ Maika 1,100plan silvan dagɨaba uamategha da isava uan amebam ganɨngi. Ezɨ an amebam kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ silvan dagɨar kaba Ikiavɨra Itir God danightɨ, dagɨar kaba nan otarim baghavɨra ikiam. Egh dagɨar kaba, ga da isɨva gumazitabar anightɨ, me dar marvir guatamningɨn ingarightɨ, e aningɨn ziamning fam. Me temer otevitam marvir guatam akɨrighɨva silvan a nokegh, egh marvir guatam silvan kɨnimra an ingarigh.”17:3 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. E uaghan fozir puvatɨ, aning manmagh garir nedazimɨn dɨgɨrim silvan kamɨn a gami. Ezɨ 18:24ɨn akamɨn, Maika nedazimning kamaghɨn aning dɨbori, “aser godɨn kɨ ingarizimning.”
